job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltstronggtjob descriptionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtthe roleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtare you interested in joining a fastpaced organization where you can make an immediate impact on the business do you want to be an artificial intelligence aimachine learning ml advocate using data to answer important questions and shape strategy for leadership you can be a part of the fidelity technology that constantly pushes the potential of data to drive the business forwardltbrgtltbrgtthe fidelity fund ampamp investment operations ffio technology team is looking for a ltstronggtdata scientist ltstronggtto join their business process automation and analytics team in westlake tx this role will be responsible for developing and delivering data science solutions on multiple business automation initiatives using analytical platforms additionally the person will be responsible for collaborating with key partners eg business unit technology teams data architecture analytics designers in the implementation of data science solutionsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtthe expertise and skills you bringltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtminimum masters degree in engineering computer science mathematics computational statistics operations research machine learning or related technical fieldsltligtltligt years of prior work experience as a data scientist delivered machine learning projects for business partnerltligtltligtproficiency in the entire data modeling life cycle from exploratory data analysis to data cleaning to feature engineering to model building and validation operationalization and scalability of scientific techniques and establishing decision strategiesltligtltligtexperience developing supervised and unsupervised machine learning algorithms regression decision treesrandom forest neural networks nlp feature selectionreduction clustering parameter tuning etcltligtltligtexperience in projects involving large scale multidimensional databases complex business infrastructure and crossfunctional teamsltligtltligtprogramming skills in python sql rltligtltligthands on experience on using aws framework is a plusltligtltligtexperience in the financial domain and familiarity with financial models are highly desirableltligtltligtability to partner closely with a diverse set of business stakeholders to identify needs and deliver aiml solutionsltligtltligtability to gather and analyze large amounts of information expeditiouslyltligtltligtproven expertise synthesizing and presenting researchtechnical findings to diverse audiencesltligtltligtvalidated skills in algorithm development and predictive modelingltligtltligtability to discover new opportunities where analytical techniques can be leveraged for solving business problemsltligtltligtbringing an outstanding datadriven mindset to a variety of business problemsltligtltligtensuring that aiml use cases are optimally identified prioritized and executedltligtltligtcollaborating and coordinating with other team membersltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtthe teamltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtfidelity fund ampamp investment operations ffio technology team crafts and maintains technology solutions and products that enable ffio to provide accounting and investment management support services to fidelity businesses and fund shareholders as part of ffio business automation and analytics team is responsible for providing thoughtleadership in implementation of data science and analytical deliverables for improving operational excellence and delivering business operations insightsltbrgtltbrgtffio delivery teams are organized as small multifunctional squads delivering specific business ampamp technology goals defined by the tribesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtcertificationsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtcompany overviewltbrgtltbrgtat fidelity investments our customers are at the heart of everything we do as a privately held company with a rich year history our mission has remained the same since our founding ltemgtto strengthen the financial wellbeing of our clientsltemgt we help people invest and plan for their future we assist companies and nonprofit organizations in delivering benefits to their employees and we provide institutions and independent advisors with investment and technology solutions to help invest their own clients moneyltbrgtltbrgtjoin usltbrgtltbrgtat fidelity youll find endless opportunities to build a meaningful career that positively impacts peoples lives including yours you can take advantage of flexible benefits that support you through every stage of your career empowering you to thrive at work and at home and you dont need a finance background to succeed at fidelitywe offer a range of opportunities for learning and growth so you can build the career youve always imagined we welcome associates from different backgrounds and with different perspectives to help us innovate and make a difference for our customers and our communitiesltbrgtltbrgtwe invite you to ltstronggtfind your fidelityltstronggt at fidelitycareerscomltbrgtltbrgtfidelity investments is an equal opportunity employer we believe that the most effective way to attract develop and retain a diverse workforce is to build an enduring culture of inclusion and belongingltbrgtltbrgtfidelity will reasonably
